title: ICE: Unsized struct type with no unsized type params?

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
### STR

``` rust
use std::mem;

pub struct MatrixPtr<T> {
    stride: uint,
    data: [T],
}

fn main() {
    println!("{}", mem::size_of::<Box<MatrixPtr<u8>>>());
}
```
### Backtrace

note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
